channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: Alpha School, Grokipedia, and Real Estate AI Videos
item.description: In this episode of Uncanny Valley, we run through the top stories of the week and dive into why the promise of a tech-forward school in Texas with sof...

item.title: Facebook Groups can now go public without exposing members’ private posts
item.description: This update will allow Facebook Groups to expand their reach without having to start a public group from scratch or exposing their members' past posts...

item.title: OpenAI Signs $38 Billion Deal With Amazon
item.description: OpenAI has committed to buying billions of dollars worth of compute from AWS—the latest in a string of major deals brokered by the AI startup.

item.title: Trump’s CZ Pardon Has the Crypto World Bracing for Impact
item.description: The Trump administration has recast Binance founder CZ as a martyr—and his pardon may have unintended consequences for the US crypto industry.

item.title: Our Favorite Earbuds for Android Users Are $60 Off
item.description: Save a chunk of change on the excellent Google Pixel Buds Pro 2.

item.title: Your Friend Asked You a Question. Don't Copy and Paste an Answer From a Chatbot
item.description: Your friend came to you because they respect your knowledge and opinion, and outsourcing the answer to a machine is lazy and rude. Just answer them yo...

item.title: Lambda inks multi-billion-dollar AI infrastructure deal with Microsoft
item.description: This deal was announced just hours after Microsoft announced a $9.7 billion deal with Australian data center company IREN.

item.title: DOJ accuses US ransomware negotiators of launching their own ransomware attacks
item.description: Three people, including two U.S. ransomware negotiators, are accused of working on behalf of the ALPHV/BlackCat ransomware gang.

item.title: Chrome can now autofill your passport, driver’s license, and vehicle registration info
item.description: Google says Chrome can now also better understand complex forms and varied formatting requirements, which will improve accuracy across the web.

item.title: Waymo’s robotaxi expansion accelerates with 3 new cities
item.description: Waymo said Monday it will launch a robotaxi service in Detroit, Las Vegas, and San Diego as the Alphabet-owned company hits the accelerator on its exp...
